Class ArchiveSessionService

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.services.ArchiveSessionService
@Service public class ArchiveSessionService extends Object

This class is the Spring Boot service responsible for managing interacting with active and completed sessions.

This class uses the following settings from the application.properties file to configure itself:

  • archiveServer.session.persistSecs
  • archiveServer.session.checkIntervalMilli

All archiveServer.session settings have a class attribute counterpart.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Integer
    checkIntervalMilli
    This attribute represents the interval in milliseconds that the session service waits before checking session activity.
    private final ArchiveLogService
    logService
    This attribute represents the injected ArchiveLogService.
    private final ArchiveMessageService
    messageService
    This attribute represents the injected ArchiveMessageService.
    private ArchiveParseRepository
    parseRepository
    This attribute represents the ArchiveParseRepository interface.
    private final HashMap<String, CompletableFuture<ArchiveServerFutureData>>
    sessionMap
    This attribute represents the in-memory map used for tracking active sessions.
    private final Integer
    sessionPersistSecs
    This attribute represents the amount of time sessions can exist in active tracking without having an update.
    private ArchiveSessionRepository
    sessionRepository
    This attribute represents the ArchiveSessionRepository interface.

      This attribute represents the ArchiveSessionRepository interface.

      This attribute represents the ArchiveParseRepository interface.

      private final HashMap<String, CompletableFuture<ArchiveServerFutureData>> sessionMap

      This attribute represents the in-memory map used for tracking active sessions.

      private final Integer sessionPersistSecs

      This attribute represents the amount of time sessions can exist in active tracking without having an update.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveSessionService

      public ArchiveSessionService(@Value("${archiveServer.session.persistSecs}") Integer sessionPersistSecs, @Value("${archiveServer.session.checkIntervalMilli}") Integer checkIntervalMilli, ArchiveLogService logService, ArchiveMessageService messageService)

      This constructor injects services and values into the archive session service.

      Parameters:
      sessionPersistSecs - Amount of persistence time in seconds.
      checkIntervalMilli - Session checking interval in milliseconds.
      logService - The injected logging service.
      messageService - The injected message service.

  • Method Details

    • addSession

      @Transactional public void addSession(String newSessionId, String sessionNickname, ArchiveParseType parseType, String parseTargetLink)

      This method adds a new session to the database.

      Parameters:
      newSessionId - The session ID.
      sessionNickname - The session's nickname.
      parseType - The type of parsing running inside the session.
      parseTargetLink - The target web link of the parsing.

    • addToSessionMap

      public void addToSessionMap(String newSessionId, CompletableFuture<ArchiveServerFutureData> newFuture)

      This method adds a new session to the session tracking map.

      Parameters:
      newSessionId - The session ID.
      newFuture - The session's CompletableFuture.

    • getSession

      public ArchiveSession getSession(String sessionId)

      This method retrieves a session entry from the session table using the session ID.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      Returns:
      The corresponding ArchiveSession entity.

    • getCanceledStatus

      public boolean getCanceledStatus(String sessionId)

      This method retrieves the cancel status of a session entry using the session ID.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      Returns:
      The corresponding session's canceled flag.

    • cancelSession

      @Transactional public boolean cancelSession(String sessionId)

      This method cancels a session using the session ID.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      Returns:
      A boolean for whether the operation was successful.

    • updateSessionFull

      @Transactional public void updateSessionFull(String sessionId, ArchiveSession updatedSessionEntity)

      This method updates a session entry with full session entry.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      updatedSessionEntity - The new ArchiveSession entity to replace the old one.

    • updateLastRecordedMessage

      @Transactional public void updateLastRecordedMessage(String sessionId, String newLastRecordedMessage)

      This method updates a session entry's last recorded message.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      newLastRecordedMessage - The new message to replace the old one.

    • updateChaptersTotal

      @Transactional public void updateChaptersTotal(String sessionId, Integer chapterCount)

      This method updates a session entry's total chapter count.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      chapterCount - The new chapter count to replace the old one.

    • updateChaptersCompleted

      @Transactional public void updateChaptersCompleted(String sessionId, Integer chapterCount)

      This method updates a session entry's completed chapter count.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      chapterCount - The new chapter count to replace the old one.

    • updatePurgeStatus

      @Transactional public void updatePurgeStatus(ArrayList<String> sessionsToDelete, ArrayList<String> finalSessionMessages)

      This method updates the purge status of a list of sessions. This method also updates the last recorded message of the list of sessions since asynchronous tasks can update itself even after the session is officially declared done.

      Parameters:
      sessionsToDelete - The list of session IDs.
      finalSessionMessages - The list of corresponding last messages.

    • purgeOldTasks

      public void purgeOldTasks()

      This method checks the session tracking map for sessions that have not been recently updated and removes them.

    • sessionTaskMonitor

      @Async("archiveServerAsyncExecutor") public void sessionTaskMonitor() throws InterruptedException

      This method is an asynchronous session task monitor that runs the purgeOldTasks() method in intervals.

      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line is interrupted mid-execution.
